title: Tornado Dev Team
author: Tornado Dev Team
created_time: November 16, 2022, 09:26:24 PMLast edit: January 04, 2023, 12:17:25 AM by Tornado Dev Team
content: ğŸŒªTORNADO CASH v2.0ğŸŒªTornado Cash improves transaction privacy by breaking the on-chain link between source and destination addresses. It uses a smart contract that accepts BNB, BUSD, STORM and soon other token deposits that can be withdrawn by a different address. To preserve privacy a relayer is used to withdraw to an address with no balance. Whenever ETH or BNB is withdrawn by the new address, there is no way to link the withdrawal to the deposit, ensuring complete privacy when the protocol is used correctly. Â We will soon deploy to ETH and other EMV chains. Our Team forked the Tornado Cash github and community repo then released Tornado Cash v2.0. Â The only differences between Tornado Cash v1 and v2 are:1. Our website, smart contracts and RPC nodes are not sanctioned by any authority so users have a much faster and smoother experience Â Â  Â (v1 users report unable to deposit or withdrawal due to website down and RPC nodes blocking access to smart contracts); 2. Our servers are located in Panama (Central America) that, currently, has no laws related to coin mixing and cryptocurrency in general; 3. User data from v1 reveals most users did not utilize the platform correctly thereby revealing their deposit address therefore the use of a Relayer is MANDATORY with v2; 4. All protocol fees are donated to the STORM token DAO.Everything else is exactly the same including the fees charged, 1% to the Tornado protocol and 1% to the Relayer.WEBSITEwww.tornadocash2.com GITHUBhttps://github.com/Tornadocash2TECHNICAL WHITEPAPERhttps://drive.proton.me/urls/6BBC84ZHJR#VGtQ93RPaNisSMART CONTRACT AUDITShttps://twitter.com/Tornadocash2/status/1591471360353906690TOP100TOKENhttps://top100token.com/address/0xbBC4C1e5Bafe890B48639d493ca218EDa13f8e7bSTORM CONTRACT ADDRESShttps://bscscan.com/address/0xbBC4C1e5Bafe890B48639d493ca218EDa13f8e7b#codeTELEGRAM https://t.me/tornadocash_v2TWITTERhttps://twitter.com/Tornadocash2Soon, we will also destroy the keys in a trusted setup ceremony so that no person or other entity can modify or stop the smart contracts. THIS WILL MAKE TORNADO CASH v2.0 TRUSTLESS, DECENTRALIZED AND UNSTOPPABLE

comments.author: Tornado Dev Team
comments.created_time: November 27, 2022, 04:23:33 PMLast edit: January 04, 2023, 12:19:25 AM by Tornado Dev Team
comments.body: TORNADO CASH v2. 0Tornado Cash mejora la privacidad de las transacciones al romper el vÃ­nculo en cadena entre las direcciones de origen y destino. Utiliza un contrato inteligente que acepta BNB, BUSD, STORM y pronto otros depÃ³sitos de tokens que pueden retirarse con una direcciÃ³n diferente. Para preservar la privacidad, se utiliza un retransmisor para retirar a una direcciÃ³n sin saldo. Siempre que la nueva direcciÃ³n retire ETH o BNB, no hay forma de vincular el retiro al depÃ³sito, lo que garantiza una total privacidad cuando el protocolo se utiliza correctamente. Pronto nos desplegaremos en ETH y otras cadenas EMV.Nuestro equipo bifurcÃ³ el repositorio de la comunidad y github de Tornado Cash y luego lanzÃ³ Tornado Cash v2.0.Las Ãºnicas diferencias entre Tornado Cash v1 y v2 son:1. Nuestro sitio web, los contratos inteligentes y los nodos RPC no estÃ¡n sancionados por ninguna autoridad, por lo que los usuarios tienen una experiencia mucho mÃ¡s rÃ¡pida y fluidaÂ Â  Â (los usuarios de v1 informan que no pueden depositar o retirar debido a la inactividad del sitio web y los nodos RPC que bloquean el acceso a los contratos inteligentes);2. Nuestros servidores estÃ¡n ubicados en PanamÃ¡ (CentroamÃ©rica) que, actualmente, no tiene leyes relacionadas con la mezcla de monedas y la criptomoneda en general;3. Los datos de usuario de la versiÃ³n 1 revelan que la mayorÃ­a de los usuarios no utilizaron la plataforma correctamente, lo que revela su direcciÃ³n de depÃ³sito, por lo que el uso de un repetidor es OBLIGATORIO Â Â  Â con la versiÃ³n 2;4. Todas las tarifas de protocolo se donan a STORM token DAO.Todo lo demÃ¡s es exactamente igual, incluidas las tarifas cobradas, el 1% para el protocolo Tornado y el 1% para el Retransmisor.SITIOwww.tornadocash2.comGITHUBhttps://github.com/Tornadocash2DOCUMENTO TÃ‰CNICOhttps://drive.proton.me/urls/6BBC84ZHJR#VGtQ93RPaNisTOP100TOKENhttps://top100token.com/address/0xbBC4C1e5Bafe890B48639d493ca218EDa13f8e7bDIRECCIÃ“N DEL CONTRATO DE TORMENTAhttps://bscscan.com/address/0xbBC4C1e5Bafe890B48639d493ca218EDa13f8e7b#codeTELEGRAMAhttps://t.me/tornadocash_v2TWITTERhttps://twitter.com/Tornadocash2Pronto, tambiÃ©n destruiremos las claves en una ceremonia de configuraciÃ³n confiable para que ninguna persona u otra entidad pueda modificar o detener los contratos inteligentes.ESTO HARÃ QUE TORNADO CASH v2. 0 SEA CONFIABLE, DESCENTRALIZADO E IMPARABLE

comments.body: The Dev Team will be launching the new STORM token on PancakeSwap Thursday, January 5th at 12 NOON Panama TIME (5pm utc time).If you have not swapped out your old tokens at this time DM team member @Aresgod1 on TG for instructions.

comments.author: Tornado Dev Team
comments.body: STORM TOKEN now live on PancakeSwap https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0xbBC4C1e5Bafe890B48639d493ca218EDa13f8e7b**Contract Address to import STORM TOKEN** 0xbBC4C1e5Bafe890B48639d493ca218EDa13f8e7bInitial price set at .08 cents as previously disclosed. **NOTE**There are only 20,000 tokens in the LP because the rest are owned by the community.Tornado Dev Team
